original_title: US push to build naval drone fleet ‘not going well’ – Reuters — RT World News
article_summary: "US President Donald Trump urges Ukrainian President Vladimir Zelensky to show flexibility in peace talks with Russia, aiming for a trilateral meeting to potentially end the conflict. Bolivian President Luis Arce accuses the US of using the 'war on drugs' as a pretext for political and economic domination in Latin America."</s>
